analysis.key_quote: A nonpartisan civil service--and we do have a nonpartisan civil service, no matter what certain partisans would have you believe in order to enable their corruption--is vital not only to a functioning democracy but to a functioning modern state.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and warning against the dangers of politicization and corruption, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and due process.
